dynaForm.name: date
dynaForm.PME_VALIDATE_NAME: SELECT XMLNODE_NAME, TYPE FROM dynaForm WHERE XMLNODE_NAME = @@PME_XMLNODE_NAME

PMED_AFTERBEFORE_DESC.en:
Sufixes: d=day m=month y=year;
Or leave empty to use Start and End dates.

dynaForm.PME_DEPENDENTFIELDS: select XMLNODE_NAME, XMLNODE_NAME AS NAME FROM dynaForm WHERE XMLNODE_NAME <> @@PME_XMLNODE_NAME AND XMLNODE_NAME <> "" AND ( TYPE="text" or TYPE="textarea" or TYPE="dropdown" or TYPE="listbox" or TYPE="hidden" ) Dependent Fields (none)
